content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"This is the frame page of the UBS Budapest Clear Screen and Clear Desk Training.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Please download the training material by clicking on the below link and read it carefully.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"attachment\",\"data\":{\"size\":150817,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/2eb534ce-ff71-406e-87ea-163c17c745d0/UBS-BUD_ClearScreenAndClearDeskPolicy_2.1.pdf?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/2eb534ce-ff71-406e-87ea-163c17c745d0/UBS-BUD_ClearScreenAndClearDeskPolicy_2.1.pdf?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"UBS-BUD_ClearScreenAndClearDeskPolicy_2.1.pdf\",\"name\":\"UBS-BUD_ClearScreenAndClearDeskPolicy_2.1.pdf\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"application\",\"subtype\":\"pdf\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"iframe\",\"id\":\"2eb534ce-ff71-406e-87ea-163c17c745d0\",\"extension\":\"pdf\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Note that for legal reasons, they may have some overlaps with the general EPAM Clear Desk training. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
